metadata.title: CVE-2017-11523 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The ReadTXTImage function in coders/txt.c in ImageMagick through 6.9.9-0and 7.x through 7.0.6-1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite loop) via a crafted file, because the end-of-filecondition is not considered.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
